languages.text: "Убогий же разум черни за столетия придумал свою, искаженную историю. В которую потомки колонистов продолжают верить по сей день".

traits.locale_text: "Убогий же разум черни за столетия придумал свою, искаженную историю. В которую потомки колонистов продолжают верить по сей день".

languages.text: "Over hundreds of years, the limited minds of the rabble have invented their own twisted history, one that the colonists' descendants still believe to this day."
languages.original_text: "Убогий же разум черни за столетия придумал свою, искаженную историю. В которую потомки колонистов продолжают верить по сей день".

traits.locale_text: "In hundreds of years, the petty minds of the mob have invented their own twisted history — the one that the descendants of the colonialists still believe to this day."
"In hundreds of years, the petty minds of the mob have invented their own twisted history — the one that the descendants of the colonialists still believe to this day."
"In hundreds of years, the petty minds of the mob have invented their twisted history — the one that the descendants of the colonialists still believe to this day."
"In hundreds of years, the petty minds of the mob have invented their twisted history — the one that the descendants of the colonialists still believe to this day."
"Over hundreds of years, the limited minds of the rabble have invented their own twisted history, one that the colonists' descendants still believe to this day."
"Over hundreds of years, the limited minds of the rabble have invented their own twisted history, one that the colonists' descendants still believe to this day."

languages.text: «A lo largo de los siglos, las mentes limitadas de la plebe han distorsionado su propia historia, pergeñando un relato que los actuales descendientes de aquellos colonos todavía siguen creyendo».
languages.original_text: "Over hundreds of years, the limited minds of the rabble have invented their own twisted history, one that the colonists' descendants still believe to this day."

traits.locale_text: «Con el paso de los siglos, las mentes simplistas de la plebe han distorsionado los hechos pergeñando una historia que los actuales descendientes de aquellos colonos todavía siguen creyendo».

languages.text: “几百年来，这里的乌合之众以他们狭隘的思想曲解了他们的历史。直至今日，这些殖民者的后代仍然相信那段所谓的历史。”
languages.original_text: "Over hundreds of years, the limited minds of the rabble have invented their own twisted history, one that the colonists' descendants still believe to this day."

traits.locale_text: “几百年来，这里的平民以他们狭隘的思想曲解了自己的历史。直至今日，这些殖民者的后代仍然相信那段所谓的历史。”

languages.text: « Au fil des siècles, l'esprit étriqué de la populace s'est inventé cette histoire faussée, celle à laquelle les descendants des colons croient encore aujourd'hui. »
languages.original_text: "Over hundreds of years, the limited minds of the rabble have invented their own twisted history, one that the colonists' descendants still believe to this day."

traits.locale_text: « Au fil des années, l'esprit étriqué de la populace s'est inventé cette histoire faussée, celle à laquelle les descendants des colons croient encore aujourd'hui. »

languages.text: 「何百年もの間、限られた頭の暴徒たちは、自分たちのねじ曲がった歴史…植民地主義者の末裔たちが今日まで信じている歴史…を発明してきた」
languages.original_text: "Over hundreds of years, the limited minds of the rabble have invented their own twisted history, one that the colonists' descendants still believe to this day."

traits.locale_text: 「何百年もの間、小さき心の暴徒たちは、自分たちのねじ曲がった歴史…植民地主義者の末裔たちが今日まで信じている歴史…を発明してきた」

languages.text: "In hunderten von Jahren hat der kleinliche Verstand des Pöbels seine eigene verdrehte Geschichte erfunden. Die Geschichte, an die die Nachfahren der Kolonialisten noch heute glauben."
languages.original_text: "Over hundreds of years, the limited minds of the rabble have invented their own twisted history, one that the colonists' descendants still believe to this day."

traits.locale_text: "In hunderten von Jahren hat der kleinliche Verstand des Mobs seine verdrehte Geschichte erfunden. Die Geschichte, an die die Nachfahren der Kolonialisten noch heute glauben."
